description.en:
Touch has been introduced to the market to provide two distinctive services; it will make crypto transactions easy through its smart debit card as well as a charity initiative. Based on its vision and roadmap; it will stand apart from its competitors and revolutionize the digital finance market. By launching $Touch, crypto is transformed from a virtual asset to a tangible currency that makes using crypto easy as a regular card payment. 
As part of our social corporate responsibility programme, we will be launching our own foundation which will benefit orphans and other less fortunate parts of society across the globe.
